title: Answers
description: Schema for answer files. I fucking hate json now that I know what yaml is, but sadly I can't use yaml. My website hoster doesn't have the yaml extension installed :(

pairs.description:
An array of 'pair's.
A pair is an object with a "patterns" array, and a "response" string. The response string will be displayed to the user when their answer matches the pattern.
Can contain "regex": true to use regular expressions, and "exact": true to make the answer exact.

patterns.description:
An array of strings. The php will check if the user's answer contains one of these strings, and respond with the "response" string.
When "regex" is true, it will be used as a regular expression instead.
When "exact" is true, it will match the user's answer to the strings exactly, instead of checking if the answer contains one of the strings.
